thread.title: Chelsea transfer target Franck Kessie says he dreams about Man United | Metro News
thread.title_full: Chelsea transfer target Franck Kessie says he dreams about Man United | Metro News

author: Sean Kearns For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Chelsea transfer target Franck Kessie says he dreams about Man United | Metro News
text:
Sean Kearns for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 22 Feb 2017 6:15 pm Franck Kessie is a wanted man this summer(Picture: Getty) 
Chelsea transfer target Franck Kessie admits he dreams about joining Premier League rivals Manchester United. 
The Atalanta midfielder has attracted interest from all over Europe and Chelsea had a £22million bid rejected for the Ivory Coast international in January. Man Utd star likely to miss EFL Cup final after hamstring injury vs Saint-Etienne 
Antonio Conte is a huge admirer of the 22-year-old but Serie A giants Roma are also keen on Kessie’s services and Atalanta are hopeful of raising as much as £30m for his departure this summer. 
Chelsea are expected to make another move for Kessie this summer and, though he says he would struggle to turn down a move to Stamford Bridge, the midfielder says a move to Old Trafford is his dream. Chelsea had a £22m bid rejected for Kessie in January (Picture: Getty) 
‘I did not hear any rumours around Roma, as I was at the Africa Cup of Nations and so focused only on playing,’ Kessie told Tuttomercatoweb. 
‘I like the Premier League and in particular Manchester United, the club I dream of playing for. 
‘Chelsea? That is also a big club, nobody would turn them down, but I dream of United.’
